mapper.select:
select bm.name_en as tableName,bmc.name_en as colName ,catalog_id as id from std_original_model bm left join std_original_model_column bmc ON bm."id"=bmc.model_id
where bm.del_flag=0 AND bmc.del_flag=0 AND bmc.name_en is NOT NULL
select id, catalog_id as catalogId from std_original_model where del_flag = 0
